raw_body: DE SILVA – NIHAL – Remains of our much loved husband,​ father,​ grandfather,​ brother,​ uncle and friend – Nihal Cyril Ignatius de Silva – will be at the A.F. Raymond’s Parlour on Friday,​ 13th October,​ from 8.30 a.m. – 4.30 p.m.,​ followed by Burial Service at 5.00 p.m. at the Borella Cemetery (Roman Catholic Section). Nihal was the devoted husband of Priyanthie,​ most beloved father of Ayesha,​ Dedunie and Marisa,​ father-in-law of Nalin and Anuruddha,​ grandfather of Liam,​ brother of Shirani (deceased),​ Carmen,​ Lakshman,​ Sharmi,​ Teddy and George and brother-in-law of Noel,​Neville,​ Shirani,​ Naomal,​ Sirilin and Sweena. “He was our North,​ our South,​ our East and West and he will live in our hearts for eternity !”065729
